institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 18 (operation of training courses, etc.)
contents: Article 18 (Operation of training courses, etc.) ① If a business group conducts training according to the business plan, it must report training implementation in accordance with Article 8 of the employer support regulations. ② The business group must receive support for the operation of the training course and training costs. Matters not stipulated in these rules regarding the completion criteria for training are subject to the employer support regulations.
